title: Vinci nabs $46M to speed up chip simulations with AI
description: Vinci4D Inc., a provider of simulation software for chip designers, has secured $46 million in funding to enhance its technology. The startup raised the capital over two rounds that it announced on Tuesday. The financing came from Xora Innovation, Eclipse and…
content:
Vinci4D Inc., a provider of simulation software for chip designers, has secured $46 million in funding to enhance its technology.
